unnormalised: My blood report showed a WBC count of 12000/microliter, which worried Dr. Mehra. Turns out, the normal range is between 4500-11000/microliter, so he prescribed some antibiotics for the infection.
normalised: My blood report showed a W-B-C count of twelve thousand per microliter, which worried Doctor Mehra. Turns out, the normal range is between four thousand five hundred to eleven thousand per microliter, so he prescribed some antibiotics for the infection.
